subject: Re: [junit] JUnit extension
msgSnippet: Hi, I think it is usefull, and the GUI TestRunners already offer this possibility of running a particular testMethod. Mathieu ...
messageBody:
Hi,

I think it is usefull, and the GUI TestRunners already offer this
possibility of running a particular testMethod.

Mathieu

>As an alternative I'm considering implementing the following extension:
>
>java junit.textui.TestRunner my.package.ExportTest testEntityAttributes
>
